reviews.review: Gave me Robophobia, Mechanophobia, Claustrophobia and Taphephobia.

Um dos jogos mais cativantes feitos pela Valve, com puzzles que envolvem o jogador e o desafiam.
Apesar de ser bem antigo, o jogo difícilmente tem bugs visíveis ou fáceis de se fazer, é uma experiência incrível tanto jogando solo, quanto jogando em coop, tanto jogando a história quanto os mapas de desafios e os mapas da comunidade.

What an incredibly fun game.  The puzzles were challenging and had me scratching my head a couple times. The funny banter from the two robots was so entertaining I loved hearing all the insults they had to say.  Shame the journey is over.
one of the best games ever made, great story, fun game mechanics, and pretty good graphics for it's time.

Un juegazo de aquellos, con mucha entretención, cumplió mis espectativas, buenas dificultades y jugabilidad; la historia para que decirlo, fenomenal, lo recomiendo para quienes disfrutan de puzzles y desafios para tu mente <3.
Portal/portal 2 are both very fun games. I can't wait unlit portal 3 come's out.
非常非常推荐，无论是单人游玩还是多人游玩

portalling in n out, just like dad showed me

I know I haven't played it much here, but I've sunk hours and days and weeks into the console version. If that is anything to go by, then it is a perfect continuation from "Portal". I loved exploring the history of the laboratory, as well as seeing everything in glorious high quality (whoo boi that sounds like the start of a sponsorship). Single player is great and the puzzle aspects were even good enough to get my parents slightly interested? For reference, they usually despise video games... The multiplayer experience is what I got the game for though. Whether a buddy has brought their laptop over or you're playing whilst in a Discord call, it's so fun to just work through the levels together. Just make sure your friend isn't prone to raging or self sabotage beforehand. I would always recommend this game. It's a classic!!

Классная игра с охрененным дубляжом и чудесной графикой. Загадки выше всяких похвал, сюжет интересный, концовка неожиданная. Отдельный респект переводчикам, они смогли передать почти все интересные фразы оригинала.
